extension.summary: Frndly TV - Live TV Streaming for Kodi
extension.description:
Frndly TV for Kodi - The Ultimate Live TV Streaming Add-on
WHAT IS THIS ADD-ON? Frndly TV for Kodi is a video add-on that allows you to stream live television channels directly from your Frndly TV subscription within Kodi. This add-on eliminates the need for Docker containers, external servers, or additional hardware - everything runs directly on your device.
FEATURES: • Live TV Streaming - Watch all your Frndly TV channels in real-time • Full EPG Support - Electronic Program Guide with show titles, descriptions, episode info, thumbnails, and TV parental ratings (TV-Y, TV-G, TV-PG, TV-14, TV-MA) • Channel Logos & Numbers - Professional channel presentation with official logos • PVR/DVR Integration - Record your favorite shows with full metadata support • Built-in Web Server - Optional server for IPTV client integration (TiviMate, Channels DVR, etc.) • Fire TV & Android TV Compatible - Works on Fire Stick, Android TV boxes, and all Kodi devices • Self-Contained - No external server or computer required
REQUIREMENTS: • Kodi 19 (Matrix) or later • Active Frndly TV subscription • Internet connection
CREATED BY: Marcus Montgomery / BeatTLF Entertainment
BASED ON: frndlytv-for-channels by Matt Huisman (https://github.com/matthuisman/frndlytv-for-channels)
DISCLAIMER: This add-on is not affiliated with or endorsed by Frndly TV. You must have a valid Frndly TV subscription to use this add-on.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not affiliated with Frndly TV. A valid subscription is required.
